DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , prospective , observational study patient admit intensive care unit ( ICU ) . This study include treatment intervention consider Nonsignificant Risk .
DOC.brief_title: Rapid Evaluation Acute Kidney Injury With NGAL Acutely Ill Patients ICU
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct two phase . Phase One specimen acquisition subject diagnosis adjudication . Phase Two biomarker test . Phase One Approximately 850 adult admit general ICUs enrol within 12 hour receipt ICU admission order . Study specific whole blood urine specimen collect . There Adjudication Committee study . This committee comprise qualified , board-certified nephrologists . Phase Two During Phase Two , plasma specimen divide amongst three clinical site representative intended end user assay , test separate testing protocol .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must 21 year age old . Subjects must admit Intensive Care Unit ( medical surgical ) must enrol study within 12 hour receipt ICU admission order . Subjects must assess likely alive ICU minimum 48 hour enrollment . The following plasma/serum creatinine value must available : Subjects admit ICU follow elective surgery procedure must least one presurgical/ preprocedure creatinine value obtain 7 day prior presentation ICU . Subjects admit ICU reason follow elective surgery procedure must least one creatinine value obtain great 7 day 6 month prior presentation ICU . Exclusion Criteria Subjects either receive imminent need Renal Replacement Therapy . Subjects evidence chronic kidney disease stag 4 5 evidenced preenrollment estimate GFR le 30 mL/min/1.73M2 ( accord 4variable MDRD22 ) . Subjects obstructive uropathy time presentation ICU . Subjects know urothelial , urological kidney malignancy . Subjects urologic procedure surgery immediately prior admission ICU . Subjects renal transplant nephrectomy . Subjects cardiovascular surgery involve cardiopulmonary bypass within previous 7 day . Subjects participate interventional clinical study within previous 30 day include study investigational noninvestigational drug . The inability obtain write Informed Consent subject authorize representative . Subjects previously enrol study prior admission ICU .
